posts.post_title: SOLD   N172 Hungler For Sale  SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kevin Cummings
Gorgeous picture, but also has some inconsequential back issues that SGC would absolutely slam the card for anyway, so it's hardly worth the expense to get it graded if someone would just as soon buy it raw.

I send it your way for $360 delivered.

Would also consider a trade, if it's for an N172 for which I am looking.
